title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Mixture of both is higher than any other categories with value 44.0, followed by Fiction, and Non-fiction. Down to category Neither with the lowest value of 8.0.
The highest value at Mixture of both is almost 5.5 times larger than the minimum value of Neither.
The highest value at Mixture of both is almost 5.5 times larger than the minimum value of Neither.
The difference between the max Response Mixture of both and min Response Neither is 36.0.
